roleset.name: revoking, annulling

example.name: Both args
example.text: The law here sought to be applied was deprived of force by the people themselves as the inescapable effect of their repeal of the Eighteenth Amendment.

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, WordNet, repeal-v.01. No VNcls.

example.name: arg1
example.text: 3 Repeal of Obamacare : No replacement , just repeal .
